body.p:
F. H. HEGAN,
Dealer in Wall Paper, Looking Glasses, Window Glass,
Photograph and Ambrotype Materials, and Manufacturer of Gilt Frames,
411 MAIN STREET, BETWEEN FOURTH AND FIFTH, LOUISVILLE.
Govenor
Thos E. Bramlette
Dear Sir

I was one of the Jury that tried & condemned John Welch charged with the murder of Mrs Allen Gavin. It would now be inconsistent to ask your Excellency to pardon the accused but I pray your Excellency to grant him a respite
